tasks.name: Literature Review
tasks.prompt: Conduct a comprehensive literature review on protein binding sites, including their structures, functions, and relevance in biological processes.

tasks.name: Data Collection
tasks.prompt: Collect data on specific protein binding sites, focusing on their characteristics, interactions, and any relevant case studies.

tasks.name: Analysis and Interpretation
tasks.prompt: Analyze the collected data to identify patterns, relationships, and key findings related to protein binding sites.

tasks.name: Report Structure
tasks.prompt: Outline the structure of the report, including an introduction, methodology, results, discussion, and conclusion.

tasks.name: Introduction
tasks.prompt: Write the introduction section of the report, providing background information on protein binding sites and the purpose of the study.

tasks.name: Methodology
tasks.prompt: Describe the methodology used in the study, including data sources, experimental design, and analysis techniques.

tasks.name: Results
tasks.prompt: Present the results of the analysis, including tables, figures, and text descriptions of the findings.

tasks.name: Discussion
tasks.prompt: Discuss the implications of the findings, comparing them with existing literature and highlighting any new insights.

tasks.name: Conclusion
tasks.prompt: Summarize the key points of the study and suggest potential future research directions.
